31#ifndef _READPASSPHRASE_H_
32#define _READPASSPHRASE_H_
33
34#define RPP_ECHO_OFF 0x00 /* Turn off echo (default). */
35#define RPP_ECHO_ON 0x01 /* Leave echo on. */
36#define RPP_REQUIRE_TTY 0x02 /* Fail if there is no tty. */
37#define RPP_FORCELOWER 0x04 /* Force input to lower case. */
38#define RPP_FORCEUPPER 0x08 /* Force input to upper case. */
39#define RPP_SEVENBIT 0x10 /* Strip the high bit from input. */
40
41#include <sys/cdefs.h>
42
43__BEGIN_DECLS
44char * readpassphrase __P((const char *, char *, size_t, int));
45char * getpass __P((const char *));
46__END_DECLS
47
48#endif /* !_READPASSPHRASE_H_ */
49
